259:2: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ|| [1]
259:3: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma|
259:4: asti mañjuśrīrupariṣṭāyāmaparimitaguṇasaṃcayo nāma lokadhātustatrāparimitāyu[r]jñānasuviniścitatejorāja nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati| [2]
259:8: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātramapi śroṣyanti yāvat pustakāgatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpa-dhūpa-gandha-mālya-vilepana-cūrṇa-cīvara-cchatra-dhvaja-ghaṇṭā-patākābhiśca samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti te parikṣināyuṣaḥ punareva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti|
259:9: ye khalu punarmañjuśriḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācaviṣyanti,
259:11: ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣāmapyāyurvivardhayiṣyati| [3]
259:12: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrirdīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti teṣāṃ ime guṇānusaṃsā bhaviṣyanti| [4]
259:13: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya,
259:16: oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā| [5]
259:17: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecillikhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
259:22: tena khalu punaḥ samayena navanavatīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitam| [7]
259:24: tena khalu punaḥ samayena caturaśītīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitam| [8]
259:26: tena khalu punaḥ samayena saptasaptatīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ| [9]
259:28: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣītam| [10]
259:30: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcapañcaśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ| [11]
259:32: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcacatvāriṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ| [12]
259:34: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ṣattriṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ| [13]
259:36: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ| [14]
259:38: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ| [15]
259:40: as para. 5] yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati|
259:43: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa na kadācin narakeṣupapadyate na tiryagyonau na yamaloke na akṣaṇeṣu ca kadācidapi upapatsyate|
259:45: tatra tatra sarvatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati| [17]
259:47: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti| [18]
259:49: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasrāṇi kārāpitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti| [19]
259:51: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti| [20]
259:52: [Para. 21 is missing in the Sanskrit text.]
259:55: tasya na māro na mārakāyikā na yakṣā na rākṣasā nākālmṛtyuravataraṃ lapsyante| [22]
259:57: as para. 5] yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
259:58: tasya maraṇakālasamaye navanavatayo buddhakoṭyaḥ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyanti,
259:61: nātm kāṅkṣā na vicikitsā na vimātirutpādayitavyā| [23]
259:64: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā rakṣāvaraṇāguptiṃ kariṣyanti| [24]
259:66: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātav amitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyate| [25]
259:70: yeṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ karṇāpuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃbodhimabhisambhotsyante| [26]
259:72: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya strībhāvo na kadācidapi bhaviṣyati| [27]
259:74: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyam uddiśya ekam api kārṣāpanāṃ dānaṃdāsyati,
259:75: tena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati| [28]
259:80: yathā vipaśvi-śikhi-viśvabhu-krakucchanda-kanakamuni-kāśyapa-śākyamuni-prabhṛtīnaṃ tathāgatānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ pūjāḥ kṛtvā tasya puṇyaskadhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ,
259:81: na tvaparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum| [30]
259:83: yathā sūmeroḥ parvatarājasya samānaṃ ratnarāśiṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt,
259:91: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati saṃskṛtya pūjayiṣyati tena daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvatathāgatā vanditāḥ pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti| [33]
259:94: dānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam || [34]
259:96: śīlabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśantam ||[35]
259:98: kṣāntibalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[36]
259:100: vīryabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[37]
259:102: dhyānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam||[38]
259:104: prajñābalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[39]
259:106: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandamiti| [40]
